attributes.action: To take Pakistan off the travel 'Red List'
attributes.additional_details: 1,174,983 British citizens are directly affected. Remove Pakistan from 'red list' just like Portugal was removed on 19/3/21 following a similar petition & review. Recent data for last 7 days show France, Germany & India have substantially higher numbers of infections per 100k but are not on the list. Pakistan currently has 13 cases per 100k people, France 403,Germany 137,UK itself has 54 & India 24 per 100k. South African variant is not a concern in Pakistan, but is in France & other countries.
attributes.background: Remove Pakistan from the travel 'Red List'. Recent medical evidence shows countries not on the list eg. France,Germany,India have up to 10 times more cases of Covid-19. Our formerly strong relationship is on the brink of collapse. Pakistan has a strong tourism & £2.9billion working trade with the UK
